4.1.1.1.1.2.1.1. unduwave.analytical_module.ana_wave.ana_eb_fields

Contains functionality for handling files.

Module to handle various file operations including finding, moving, copying, and deleting files.

4.1.1.1.1.2.1.1.1. Classes

Represents a collection of attributes with children.

unduwave.analytical_module.ana_wave.ana_eb_fields.make_coords(fun, coords1, coords2)

Takes 2 lists of coordinates for which fun is evaluated. Fun is expected to give back cartesian coordinates of a point. Returns 3 2d-arrays containing the grid coordinates

class unduwave.analytical_module.ana_wave.ana_eb_fields.aspectrum(ebeam, undulator)

Bases: unduwave.attribute_classes.attributes._attribute_collection

Represents a collection of attributes with children. This is a class containing attributes as class-members. The class members are administered in unison.

Initialize the attribute collection
